patthana4.2:1.1.pli: Kusalaṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana4.2:4.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.2:25.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.2:30.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.2:162.1.pli: Abyākataṃ nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.2:163.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.2:166.1.pli: Abyākato nahetu ahetuko dhammo abyākatassa nahetussa ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana4.2:167.1.pli: Ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
